name: Solo Fighter (Kevooonn)
description:
Hey! It's my second Game Jam ever and my second game I ever did. I didn't had much time to complete the game and I'm still a beginner, so this is some sort of a prototype (or an early access version) of my game. Updates can follow (Depends if I feel like it and want to continue working on this game ) :)

I hope you have at least some fun with the game!
